name: Milk
wikiSummary: "Milk" is a song by American rock band Kings of Leon. It is the fifth track on their 2004 album Aha Shake Heartbreak.  Rolling Stone noted that drummer Nathan Followill rips a joint on-stage each time the band plays this song live.
wikiText:
"Milk" is a song by American rock band Kings of Leon. It is the fifth track on their 2004 album Aha Shake Heartbreak.
 
 Rolling Stone noted that drummer Nathan Followill rips a joint on-stage each time the band plays this song live.
